data.name: AlterLife
data.detailed_description:
ADD TO WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401370/Viking_City_Builder/?utm_source=steam&utm_medium=baner&utm_campaign=alter_life
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1321450/American_Theft_80s/


About the Game



Create your avatar from scratch, matching every element of its appearance and personality, and then start your new life in AlterLife. Choose from hundreds of different hairstyles, shapes of nose, mouth, eyes and other physical features. The most comprehensive character editor on the market will even let you recreate yourself and your friends in a virtual environment. Then use the money you've given on start, to buy an apartment or a house in the suburbs and lead your life the way you've always dreamed of it!



In AlterLife you are only limited by your own imagination. If you want, you can lead a peaceful life, getting up in the morning, going to work, and meeting with friends after hours. Maybe you will even find the love of your life here? But nothing stands in the way of becoming a fashion, rock or movie star - you can choose from dozens of different career paths to see how your life could have turned out if you made completely different choices in the past!



AlterLife also offers an extensive interior editor! Enlarge your apartment or house for yourself or because your family is getting bigger. Buy new furniture, household appliances, wallpapers, panelling, floors and many more. You have tens of thousands of items at your disposal, which will allow you to build
an apartment of your dreams. All you have to do is make money to afford them! After all, AlterLife
is a real life simulation game, so not everything comes easy and you have to earn some luxuries.

Game features:

  • The most advanced character creator ever!
  • Build the home of your dreams and become whoever you want to be
  • Make different choices - see how your life can turn out
  • Organize parties and meet with your virtual friends

data.short_description: Get up in the morning, go to work, cook your meals, play with your friends - just live! AlterLife is a powerful virtual life simulator where you can make your biggest dreams come true!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
